eeta hethuwa budurajanan wahansege me washi karana sulu paurushathwaya harunu wita unwahanse wisin deshana karanu labana de pilibandawa asanna thula pana nagina hangima da we.mese unwahanse wisin deshana karana lada de sathyaya pamanak nowa, ee wanahi asannage wimukthiya pilibanda balaporoththu danawannak bawada, wahalun niwahal minisun bawata path karanu labana emenma panthiwalata bedunu janaya sahodarathwayata path karanu labana sathyaya, budurajanan wahansege wachana thulin owun palamu warata awabodha karaganu labanne nam hadawathak hadawathak pasa akunu sarayaka wegayen gaman ganna widuliya balaya kothanhi athdayi dakma owunata etharam apahasu nowe.budurajanan wahanse ewani uthumeki.

shri lankawe jaliya alewikaranaya pilibadawa tharana parapura menma wadihiti ayawalunda dakwanne menma ee desa balanneda ithamath patu aakarayakin wima thuladi ewan rataka duppathun kisidu dineka dhanapathiyan washayenda,ratak dhanawath ratak washayenda,sanwardhanayak kara noyanu atha.eyata mulika hethawa wanne mema jaliya alewi karanaya pilibada maha janathawa dakwana biya wiya haka.eya sadharana wanne sama ayekuma pahe diyunuwa sadaha aasawen bala sitiyada kapati piramida karawange grahanayata nathuwima nisa mema wadagath wruththiyada hri lankawa thuladi ithamath awasanawantha thathwayakata muhuna di atha.eya niwaradi aakarayen wataha gatha yuththe anagatha parapura desa mema waradi konaya niwaradi kara dima kalochitha piyawarak washayeni.meyata hodama udaharanaya washayen lowa dhanawatheku wana makkroshopt nirmathru bil gets pawasanne thama wyaparayan wethin labena dhanaya nathiwi giya hoth thaman mulasita nawatha patan ganne jaliya alewi karanayen bawaya.
